name: Airport Mania: First Flight XP Free
name_original: Airport Mania: First Flight XP Free
description:
Pack your bags for an exciting trip as you take to the skies and journey from airport to airport helping customers along the way!

Airport Mania: First Flight Lite has 2 different airports with unique challenges and whimsical planes. Upgrade your airport along the way with larger planes, painting spaces and beverage service to keep your customers happy, and be sure to avoid any delays!
